short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Review & Categorize BuyBizSell listings to make your search easier

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Finding the right business to buy can be overwhelming with so many listings to sort through. BizBuySell Reviewer simplifies your search by allowing you to categorize listings as "Not Interested" or "Maybe" directly on the results page. This extension adds two buttons to each business listing, letting you:

* Mark Listings as "Not Interested" or "Maybe": Easily tag listings you're not interested in or those you're considering.

* Save Your Preferences: The extension remembers your selections, so when you revisit or search again, you wonâ€™t waste time on listings you've already dismissed.

* Hide "Not Interested" Listings: Declutter your search results by hiding listings you've marked as "Not Interested," so you can focus on potential opportunities.

With BizBuySell Reviewer, you can streamline your search process and focus on the listings that matter most to you.
